doc:
Rappin' Granny https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rappin%27_Granny 0 Vivian Lee Smallwood (June 18, 1933 - July 22, 2017), known by her stage name Rappin' Granny, was an American grandmother who performed hip-hop music. She lived in Castaic, California, near Los Angeles. Smallwood was a contestant on the NBC television series America's Got Talent during the 2006 season. Vivian_Lee_Smallwood ( June_18_,_1933 - July_22_,_2017 ) , known by her_stage_name_Rappin_'_Granny , was an_American_grandmother who performed hip-hop_music . She lived in Castaic , California , near Los_Angeles . Smallwood was a_contestant on the_NBC_television_series_America 's_Got_Talent during the_2006_season .
